eng: For Your people and Your church ask You, and through You the Father with You, saying
Have mercy upon us, O God the Father, the Pantocrator.
Have mercy upon us, O God the Father, the Pantocrator.
Have mercy upon us, O God, the Father, the Pantocrator.
Have mercy upon us, O God the Father, the Pantocrator.
Have mercy upon us, O God the Father, the Pantocrator.
Have mercy upon us, O God, the Father, the Pantocrator.
Grant Your people oneness of heart. Give dignity to the world, good temper to the air.
